verses.verse: אַחַ֣ר ׀ <WH310> After הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> unto Abram בַּֽמַּחֲזֶ֖ה <WH4236> in a vision לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> Fear אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> not Abram אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> I [am] thy shield לָ֔ךְ שְׂכָרְךָ֖ <WH7939> reward הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> great מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [and] thy exceeding

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> And Abram אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> Lord יֱהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD מַה־ <WH4100> what תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> what wilt thou give לִ֔י וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> me הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> me seeing I go עֲרִירִ֑י <WH6185> childless וּבֶן־ <WH1121> afflicted מֶ֣שֶׁק <WH4943> steward בֵּיתִ֔י <WH1004> of my house ה֖וּא <WH1931> [is] this דַּמֶּ֥שֶׂק <WH1834> Damascus אֱלִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <WH461> Eliezer

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> And Abram הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Since לִ֔י לֹ֥א <WH3808> no נָתַ֖תָּה <WH5414> Behold to me thou hast given זָ֑רַע <WH2233> seed וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold בֶן־ <WH1121> and lo one born בֵּיתִ֖י <WH1004> in my house יוֹרֵ֥שׁ <WH3423> is mine heir אֹתִֽי׃ <WH853>

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold דְבַר־ <WH1697> And behold the word יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> [came] unto him saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִֽירָשְׁךָ֖ <WH3423> This shall not be thine heir זֶ֑ה <WH2088> This כִּי־ <WH3588> for אִם֙ <WH518> but אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> but he that shall come forth מִמֵּעֶ֔יךָ <WH4578> out of thine own bowels ה֖וּא <WH1931> he יִֽירָשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH3423> shall be thine heir

וַיּוֹצֵ֨א <WH3318> And he brought him forth אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> הַח֗וּצָה <WH2351> abroad וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הַבֶּט־ <WH5027> Look נָ֣א <WH4994> Now הַשָּׁמַ֗יְמָה <WH8064> now toward heaven וּסְפֹר֙ <WH5608> and tell הַכּ֣וֹכָבִ֔ים <WH3556> the stars אִם־ <WH518> if תּוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> if thou be able לִסְפֹּ֣ר <WH5608> to number אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> them and he said ל֔וֹ כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> unto him So יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become זַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <WH2233> shall thy seed
וְהֶאֱמִ֖ן <WH539> And he believed בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD וַיַּחְשְׁבֶ֥הָ <WH2803> and he counted לּ֖וֹ צְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> it to him for righteousness

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto him I [am] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הוֹצֵאתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH3318> that brought thee out מֵא֣וּר <WH218> of Ur כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of the Chaldees לָ֧תֶת <WH5414> to give לְךָ֛ אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> thee this land הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to inherit
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And he said אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יֱהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD בַּמָּ֥ה <WH4100> whereby אֵדַ֖ע <WH3045> shall I know כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִֽירָשֶֽׁנָּה׃ <WH3423> that I shall inherit it

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him קְחָ֥ה <WH3947> unto him Take לִי֙ עֶגְלָ֣ה <WH5697> me an heifer מְשֻׁלֶּ֔שֶׁת <WH8027> of three years old וְעֵ֥ז <WH5795> and a she goat מְשֻׁלֶּ֖שֶׁת <WH8027> of three years old וְאַ֣יִל <WH352> and a ram מְשֻׁלָּ֑שׁ <WH8027> of three years old וְתֹ֖ר <WH8449> and a turtledove וְגוֹזָֽל׃ <WH1469> and a young pigeon

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> And he took ל֣וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these וַיְבַתֵּ֤ר <WH1334> unto him all these and divided אֹתָם֙ <WH853> בַּתָּ֔וֶךְ <WH8432> them in the midst וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and laid אִישׁ־ <WH376> each בִּתְר֖וֹ <WH1335> piece לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> one against רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> another וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַצִפֹּ֖ר <WH6833> but the birds לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not בָתָֽר׃ <WH1334> divided
וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> came down הָעַ֖יִט <WH5861> And when the fowls עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַפְּגָרִ֑ים <WH6297> upon the carcases וַיַּשֵּׁ֥ב <WH5380> drove them away אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> אַבְרָֽם׃ <WH87> Abram

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> And when the sun לָב֔וֹא <WH935> was going down וְתַרְדֵּמָ֖ה <WH8639> a deep sleep נָפְלָ֣ה <WH5307> fell עַל־ <WH5921> upon אַבְרָ֑ם <WH87> upon Abram וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold אֵימָ֛ה <WH367> and lo an horror חֲשֵׁכָ֥ה <WH2825> darkness גְדֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> of great נֹפֶ֥לֶת <WH5307> fell עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לְאַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> unto Abram יָדֹ֨עַ <WH3045> Know תֵּדַ֜ע <WH3045> of a surety כִּי־ <WH3588> for גֵ֣ר ׀ <WH1616> shall be a stranger יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become זַרְעֲךָ֗ <WH2233> that thy seed בְּאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in a land לֹ֣א <WH3808> not לָהֶ֔ם וַעֲבָד֖וּם <WH5647> [that is] not theirs and shall serve וְעִנּ֣וּ <WH6031> them and they shall afflict אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> them four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> will also אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּ֛וֹי <WH1471> And also that nation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יַעֲבֹ֖דוּ <WH5647> whom they shall serve דָּ֣ן <WH1777> will I judge אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> after that כֵ֥ן <WH3651> after that יֵצְא֖וּ <WH3318> shall they come out בִּרְכֻ֥שׁ <WH7399> substance גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> with great

וְאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you תָּב֥וֹא <WH935> And thou shalt go אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> to thy fathers בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace תִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> thou shalt be buried בְּשֵׂיבָ֥ה <WH7872> old age טוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> in a good

וְד֥וֹר <WH1755> generation רְבִיעִ֖י <WH7243> But in the fourth יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> again הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> they shall come hither כִּ֧י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not שָׁלֵ֛ם <WH8003> full עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> for the iniquity הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites עַד־ <WH5704> against הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> [is] not yet

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> came הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> And it came to pass that when the sun בָּ֔אָה <WH935> went down וַעֲלָטָ֖ה <WH5939> and it was dark הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> came וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold תַנּ֤וּר <WH8574> furnace עָשָׁן֙ <WH6227> behold a smoking וְלַפִּ֣יד <WH3940> lamp אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> and a burning אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָבַ֔ר <WH5674> that passed בֵּ֖ין <WH996> between הַגְּזָרִ֥ים <WH1506> those pieces הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> In the same כָּרַ֧ת <WH3772> made יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> with אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> with Abram בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> a covenant לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֗ <WH2233> Unto thy seed נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <WH5414> have I given אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> From מִנְּהַ֣ר <WH5104> from the river מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַד־ <WH5704> far הַנָּהָ֥ר <WH5104> river הַגָּדֹ֖ל <WH1419> unto the great נְהַר־ <WH5104> the river פְּרָֽת׃ <WH6578> Euphrates
אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֵּינִי֙ <WH7017> The Kenites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּנִזִּ֔י <WH7074> and the Kenizzites וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> הַקַּדְמֹנִֽי׃ <WH6935> and the Kadmonites
וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחִתִּ֥י <WH2850> And the Hittites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּרִזִּ֖י <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> and the Rephaims

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> And the Amorites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> and the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֖י <WH1622> and the Girgashites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and the Jebusites ס
